segments.text: I see the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and it's making me anxious, he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over, this is not good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched, she's so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't notice them, but they're going to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of the mess, it's quite funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor now, it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off that stool, it would be terrible, someone needs to help them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside, it's a nice view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around and catch the children in the act, they're going to be in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being a bit too adventurous, he's going to hurt himself, I can't watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl looking up at the boy, waiting for her treat, it's a sweet moment, but I'm worried.
segments.speaker: PAR
